Title: Loulou
Writer: Arlette Langmann (scenario), Arlette Langmann (adaptation), Maurice Pialat (adaptation)
Actors: Isabelle Huppert, Gérard Depardieu, Guy Marchand, Humbert Balsan
Plot: Maurice Pialat's portrait of contemporary France mocks prosperity as a substitute for social and sexual revolution. Nelly abandons her bourgeois friends and a steady relationship for the unemployed layabout Loulou, whose charms include focusing his energy into sex.
